channel.title: Featured shows of the week from the iSportscaster fancast sports network.
channel.description: iSportscaster features 5-minute sports talk shows created by amateur sportscasters and super fans broadcasting rants, raves and predictions about their favorite team. To get your own iSportscaster show, visit www.iSportscaster.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: iSportscaster.com is the home of "fancast" sports talk radio!
channel.itunes:author: Dano Safkow
channel.itunes:summary: iSportscaster features 5-minute sports talk shows created by amateur sportscasters and super fans broadcasting rants, raves and predictions about their favorite team. To get your own iSportscaster show, visit www.iSportscaster.com.

item.title: Best of iSportscaster - Ben Chiswick's Bears Blowout - NFL Week 16
item.description: A recap of the Chicago Bears latest game with the Green Bay Packers and a look ahead towards the season finale against the Minnesota Vikings.
item.dc:creator: Dano Safkow
